name: Seek And Find The Doodle
description:
Seek And Find The Doodle is a kind of hidden object games!
Two game modes bring more fun, more emotions, more joy to you:
Timed mode - you have 90 seconds to find as much items as you can
Non-stop mode - you should find next item in a few seconds

Seek and find hundreds of colorful doodle objects!

Absolutely free and very addictive game!
